metadata.title: CVE-2012-5868 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress 3.4.2 does not invalidate a wordpress_sec session cookie upon anadministrator's logout action, which makes it easier for remote attackersto discover valid session identifiers via a brute-force attack, or modifydata via a replay attack.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
